Can you explain the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases?
Describe a challenging bug you encountered and how you resolved it.
What is your approach to writing unit tests for a REST API?
How do you handle authentication and authorization in web applications?
Explain the concept of closures in JavaScript with an example.
What are your strategies for optimizing application performance?
Have you worked with Docker or Kubernetes? Describe your experience.
How do you stay updated with new technologies and best practices?
Tell me about a time when you had to refactor legacy code.
